properties.entry: SELECT user_id, username, email,last_login, created_date_time,is_active, user_type FROM ts_resume.user where username like :username
SELECT resume_id,template_id, user_id, resume_name, created_on_time, last_accessed_time FROM ts_resume.resume where user_id = :userId

SELECT pi.personal_info_id,pi.title,pi.first_name,pi.last_name,pi.name_in_full,pi.dob, pi.email,pi.mobile,pi.profile_summary,pi.home_phone, ad.address_id,ad.street,ad.city,ad.state,ad.postal_code,ad.country FROM ts_resume.personal_info pi JOIN ts_resume.address ad on pi.address = ad.address_id WHERE pi.personal_info_id = :userId
SELECT resume_id, user_id, resume_name,template_id, created_on_time, last_accessed_time FROM ts_resume.resume where resume_id = :resumeId
